resources.string: Please place the label at the device reader
Make sure the label is written again?

Please enter an integer between 1 and 5000!
Please place the RFID tag close to the reading/writing area
RFID write succeeded. Do you want to continue?

Place the RFID tag or sticker near the back of the phone

Power supply capacity of the cabinet(1–100000)
Power supply capacity of the cabinet(W)

The failure log has been saved to

The tag information has been synchronized to the batch write page
Are you sure to delete this file?
In the reading interface, close the NFC tag to the NFC functional area of the device. If the verification code passes, the tag content will be read and displayed successfully.

A single write is divided into two modules: device information write and cabinet information write. * is a required item. When the required item is not blank, the write button is available.\nWhen performing the write operation, the label shall be close to the NFC functional area of the device to ensure that the label is read, and then click the write button. After the toast prompt box pops up, the label shall be removed from the NFC functional area to complete the write operation.

The batch write function needs to verify the device label list table in the file management first. If the verification is successful, the batch write operation of the label information in the table can be carried out.
The IT device feature data table reads the table file under the LabelRFID/feature path and can then perform the import database operation and view the import history.

The device tag list table will read the table file in the path of LabelRFID/tag, and store the data into the database after successful verification. The label information in the table can be processed in batch in the batch write.
Welcome to the label management system
1. Why do I click "batch write" without showing the table that can be input

First, check the device label list of file management, whether there is a table file;\nSecond, whether the list of device labels in the file management has been successfully verified, it cannot be written without verification.
2. Why are there no files in my file management

The system will not detect the Excel file until it is placed in the specified directory.\nIT equipment feature data table files need to be placed under LabelRFID/feature path;\n device tag list file needs to be placed under LabelRFID/tag path.
3. Click "write". Why did it prompt me to fail

The tag should be close to the reading and writing area of the device to perform the card writing operation again. It will take some time to write the tag. The tag should always be close to the reading and writing area during the writing process.

User shall agree to the terms of this agreement and complete all registration procedures as indicated on the page.By clicking the "agree" button during the registration process, the user has reached an agreement with the company and fully accepted all the terms hereunder.
The laws of the People\'s Republic of China shall apply to the conclusion, implementation and interpretation of this Agreement and the settlement of disputes.
